item.title: Kevin Hart Throws Playful Jab at Dwayne Johnson Over Filming of Action Scenes
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Ride Along' star suggests that his 'Jumanji: The Next Level' co-star is coward, unlike him and other notorious action film stars like Tom Cruise who have dangerous stunts in their movies.

item.title: Mark Wahlberg Favored to Take Lead Role in 'G.I. Joe' Reboot
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Transformers: Age of Extinction' star has reportedly been on the top of producer Lorenzo di Bonaventura's casting list since 2009's 'G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra'.

item.title: Fans Slam SXSW and Ultra Music Fest for No Refund Option Following Cancellation Due to Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Fans are clearly not satisfied with the policy with someone urging SXSW to update its policy on Twitter, writing, 'How was anyone suppose to predict an epidemic canceling @sxsw when buying tickets last year.'

item.title: J.J. Abrams Plainly Refuses to Kill C-3PO in 'Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
item.description: During an appearance on 'The View', Anthony Daniels gets candid about the director's reaction to his suggestion to put his iconic humanoid robot to sleep for good.

item.title: 'Peter Rabbit 2' Follows 'No Time to Die' Lead in Postponing Release Date Over Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Initially scheduled for a theatrical release of March 27 across the country, 'Peter Rabbit' sequel 'The Runaway' has been pushed back for more than four months by Sony chiefs.

item.title: Tracy Letts Spills How He Joined Wife Carrie Coon in 'Ghostbusters: Afterlife'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Lady Bird' actor claims to be in the right place at the right time when writer/director Jason Reitman was looking for someone to fill a small part in the new movie.

item.title: Billie Lourd Deals With Bittersweet Emotion Standing In for Carrie Fisher in 'The Rise of Skywalker'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
item.description: The Lieutenant Connix depicter in the latest 'Star Wars' movie reminisces the time she helped director J.J. Abrams and his team complete the sequences involving her late mother's iconic character.

item.title: Eva Green Claims to Be Clueless About 'Doctor Strange 2' Casting Rumors
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
item.description: While she denies involvement in 'Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness', the former Bond girl can't help but admire the Marvel franchise for 'the humor in them.'

item.title: 'Parasite' Makes History by Becoming U.K.'s Highest-Grossing Foreign-Language Film
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Banking $14.59 million since it opened on February 7, the Bong Joon Ho-directed movie breaks the box office record set by Mel Gibson's 'The Passion of the Christ' in 2004.

item.title: Daniel Craig Gets Candid About Why He Came Close to Quitting Bond After Filming 'Spectre'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Set to return as the 007 agent for one final time in 'No Time to Die', the 'Knives Out' actor opens up in a new interview why it took five years for him to go through the whole thing again.

item.title: Dougray Scott Claims Tom Cruise Cost Him Chance to Star as Wolverine
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Revealing how he lost the mutant part to Hugh Jackman, the 'Mission: Impossible 2' actor spills that his 'very powerful' co-star insisted that he had to stay and finish filming their action film.

item.title: 'Onward' Tops Box Office With Unexpected Low Opening Weekend
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Becoming one of Pixar's lowest opening weekends, the Dan Scanlon-directed animated film's $40 million earning in its first weekend is blamed on coronavirus concerns.

item.title: Julie Andrews Life Achievement Gala Gets Rescheduled by AFI Over Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: CEO and president Bob Gazzale claims that the postponement of the event will allow the organization to focus on the many gifts 'The Sound of Music' actress has given the world.

item.title: 'Clueless' to Get Three-Day Theatrical Return for Its 25th Anniversary
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The anniversary showings of the 1995 classic movie will include a special pre-show presentation that breaks down the film's iconic slang that still lives on in American culture.

item.title: Daniel Craig Confirms 'No Time to Die' as His Last Bond Movie
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: During his guest-hosting gig at 'Saturday Night Live', the five-time James Bond depicter pokes fun at screenwriter Phoebe Waller-Bridge and gives a 'sneak peak' at his delayed 007 film.

item.title: The Flash Movie May Feature Maggie Gyllenhaal as Female Joker
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The upcoming Ezra Miller-starring movie to be directed by Andy Muschietti will reportedly include the 'Flashpoint' storyline that introduces a female version of Batman's villain.

item.title: 'No Time to Die' Predicted to Lose Up to $50 Million for Release Date Delay
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The scheduled April dates for the U.K., U.S. and international release of the new James Bond movie have been pushed back to November because of the growing spread of coronavirus.

item.title: SXSW Organizers Devastated Having to Cancel Festival for First Time in 34 Years
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: City officials in Austin have advised South By Southwest bosses to scrap the March dates after Facebook, Twitter, Netflix, Amazon and Apple pulled out over coronavirus concerns.

item.title: Christian Bale Unveiled to Have Joined 'Thor: Love and Thunder' as Villain
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Letting slip the casting news is Tessa Thompson, who also offers more details of her character in the new movie, when met at the premiere event of 'Westworld' season three.

item.title: Netflix and Apple Follow Amazon in Pulling Out of 2020 SXSW Festival
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Due to coronavirus fears, the two streaming services call off planned film screenings, panels and premieres at the event taking place from March 13 to 22 in Austin, Texas.

item.title: Billy Porter's Fairy Godmother Has No Gender in 'Cinderella'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The rags-to-riches character who is portrayed by Camila Cabello is going to have a nonbinary fairy godmother in the upcoming Disney big screen adaptation.

item.title: Chance the Rapper Invited to Join Live-Action Adaptation of 'Sesame Street'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'No Problem' hitmaker, who is in talks to join the cast ensemble of the planned film, has made a guest appearance on the educational TV show in early 2019.

item.title: New 'The Batman' Official Set Photos Unveil Robert Pattinson's Vintage Batmobile
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The new vehicle to be featured in Matt Reeves' movie looks to be a modified classic American muscle car, which is unlike any other cars shown in previous Batman films.

item.title: Amazon Withdraws From SXSW Festival Over Coronavirus Concerns
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Executives at the streaming service follow Twitter and Facebook in canceling all screenings and panels scheduled for the March event after Sony delayed the release of 'No Time to Die'.

item.title: James Bond Movie 'No Time to Die' Officially Postponed Due to Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The global coronavirus pandemic has prompted the James Bond bosses to move back the international release of the upcoming 007 feature film from April to November.

item.title: Jason Statham Leaves 'Man From Toronto' Due to Creative Issues
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw' actor has allegedly pulled out of his new movie because he wants an R-rated movie while the studio leans towards a PG-13 release.

item.title: Phoebe Waller-Bridge and James McAvoy Among Top Nominees at 2020 Olivier Awards
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: 'And Juliet', the William Shakespeare-inspired musical, leads the pack with nine nominations, while 'Fleabag' vies for the Noel Coward Award for Best Entertainment or Comedy Play award.

item.title: Pharrell, Sean Penn and DMX Documentaries to Be Premiered at Tribeca Film Festival 2020
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Robert De Niro's annual Big Apple event will also feature Migos-produced documentary 'Ice Cold' and John Legend's film about civil rights activist Tommie Smith 'With Drawn Arms' among many others.

item.title: Ben Affleck Has 'Sober Liaison' While Working on Movie 'The Way Back'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Gone Girl' actor is accompanied by a 'sober liaison' provided by rehab facility while working on his new movie to make sure he doesn't fall back into his old habits.

item.title: Antonio Banderas Added to the Cast of Video Game Adaptation 'Uncharted'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: While details of his character have yet to be revealed, the 'Pain and Glory' actor will be joined by Sophia Ali of 'Grey's Anatomy' and Tati Gabrielle of 'The 100' in the action movie.
